original_text: With kings and counsellors of the earth, which build desolate places for themselves;
korean_text: 자기를 위하여 폐허를 일으킨 세상 임금들과 모사들과 함께 있었을 것이요

sentences.original_text: With kings and counsellors of the earth,
which build desolate places for themselves;
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 자신을 위해 황폐한 곳을 짓는;
